#import data
```{r}
ncb <- read.csv(file = "C:/Users/Lenovo/OneDrive/Documents/Biostatistics/Biostats Assignments/Datasets and related info/NCbirths.csv", header = TRUE)

```

#library
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

#Exploring the Relationship Between Weight Gained by Parent Giving Birth and Birthweight of Baby

```{r}
ggplot(data = ncb, aes(x = Gained, y = BirthWeightGm)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_abline() +
  labs(x = "Weight Gained by Parent", y = "Birthweight of Baby (g)", title = "Weight Gained by Parent vs Birthweight of Baby")

```


#Correlation Coefficient
```{r}
weight_cor <- ncb %>% 
  cor(x = Gained, y = BirthWeightGm)

cor(x= ncb$Gained,y = ncb$BirthWeightGm)

```
